name: community
description: A platform that predicts natural disasters, finds local resources and connects donors with charities making meaningful impact.

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:disaster-backend && npm run install:donation-backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:disaster-backend && npm run build:donation-backend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:disaster-backend" "npm run start:donation-backend"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -s first "npm run dev:disaster" "npm run dev:donation" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:disaster-backend && npm run test:donation-backend
